body.name: Office Chair, Ergonomic Home Office Desk Chairs, Breathable Mesh Comfortable Work Chair Adjustable 2D Armrests, Rocking Executive Chair, Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)
features: Ergonomic Office Chair: Winrise office chair adopts ergonomic structure design, the backrest is S-shaped which perfectly fit your body curve. Adjustable lumbar support on the back helps you maintain a relaxed posture during long working hours, protects the spine and relieves back and spinal pain, easier to disperse pressure and relieve muscle fatigue.

Comfy Breathable Mesh: The backrest of the desk chair is made of breathable mesh, which has strong tensile strength and prevents sweating and discomfort when sitting for a long time. This computer chair is made of thickened natural sponge cushion and can sit for a long time without deformation, not easy to collapse, wear-resistant fabric can be used for a longer time.

Multi-Adjustable Functions: Computer rolling chair 2D armrests are made of PU material, which is soft and skin-friendly, providing comfortable support for your arms and shoulders. The height range of 2", so you can adjust them to suit your individual needs to take the strain off your arms. Toggle the seat height adjuster to the height that suits you within 4". The recliner which adjusts the seat back angle 90°-120° allows you to enter rocking and locking modes for different sitting positions.

Reliable Mobility & Sturdy Base: The sturdy base features smooth, silent rolling casters that swivel 360°, allowing you to move around your workspace with ease. Can be used in different scenarios such as office, home, conference room and workstation. Can be used as a student study chair, computer chair, ergonomic chair, office chair, task chair. Maximum weight capacity of the home office desk chair is 300 lbs.

Easy Assembly & Aftersales: The package contains detailed installation instructions and tools so you can assemble the chair yourself. We have also uploaded the installation video on the product page for your reference. It usually takes about 10-20 minutes to assemble. If you have any questions about our products, please do not hesitate to contact us by email, we will spare no effort to assist you to solve any problems. The warranty period is 1 year. We will provide you with the best service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High quality home office desk chairs The high-quality desk chairs with wheels swivels 360 degrees, its durable casters allow you to move it anywhere you want, rolling smoothly and reducing the sound of sliding.And the office chair has a load capacity of 300 lbs,can withstand any larger user without worrying about break it

Comfortable cushion and breathable mesh back design Extra Comfort : Ergonomic office chair with thickness padded seat,soft and elastic, as if sitting on a cloud,making the office more comfortable and relaxed; Breathable Mesh Back: Ergonomic mesh office chair has durable breathable mesh back and allows air to circulate to keep you cool while leaning.

Multiple adjustment options for optimal comfort Ergonomic desk chair height can be freely adjusted, the seat can also be easily tilted to the angle you want, computer rolling chair 2D armrests have two inches of adjustable space above and below, all for you to bring the ultimate sense of comfort.

Ergonomic mesh office chair with adjustable lumbar support Our desk chairs with wheels have a adjustable lumbar support and armrest , you can adjust to fits your body curve perfectly,helps you maintain a relaxed posture during long working hours,relieves back and spine pain during long-term work,release your waist fatigue

Big and tall office chair beautiful generous and strong practicability. This large and tall office chair is suitable for offices, game rooms, living rooms, bedrooms, study rooms, etc. It will make your space more modern and elegant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and good value for price
reviews.reviewText: The Winrise Ergonomic Office Chair has truly transformed my work-from-home experience. Its thoughtful design, featuring an S-shaped backrest and adjustable lumbar support, cradles my body perfectly, promoting a relaxed posture during long hours at my desk. The breathable mesh backrest prevents discomfort and sweating, ensuring I stay cool and focused.The chair's multi-adjustable functions, including 2D armrests and a customizable height range, cater to my individual needs. The recliner option, with a seat back angle adjustment from 90° to 120°, provides versatility for various sitting positions, from focused work to moments of relaxation.Durability is evident in the thickened natural sponge cushion and wear-resistant fabric, assuring long-lasting comfort. The reliable mobility and sturdy base, complete with smooth, silent rolling casters, enhance flexibility in my workspace.Assembly is a breeze with detailed instructions and tools provided, taking only 10-20 minutes. The manufacturer's commitment to customer satisfaction is commendable, with a helpful installation video and a one-year warranty. This chair is not just an ergonomic marvel; it's a game-changer for anyone seeking comfort, functionality, and style in their workspace. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice chair at a very reasonable price. Ergonomically designed for maximum comfort. Seat height and arms adjust, seat back has a tilt adjustment and the seat is wide and deep so you don't slide out of the chair. Shipment was received quickly. Assembly was a breeze (the screws were packaged separately in blister packs).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this chair
reviews.reviewText: The chair is super comfortable and is easy to adjust. I like that it is light weight too, but feels sturdy. It was very easy to assemble as well. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value For The Money!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this chair recently for my son and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. This is a high quality chair for a fair price. It was very easy to assemble. I put the chair together myself in less than 20 minutes. The seat is roomy, there is a decent amount of back support and it is comfortable after sitting in it for several hours at a time. I would highly recommend this item if you are looking for a new office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable for price
reviews.reviewText: I started a new job where my chair had a broken support back. I got permission to order a new office chair. I am over 250 lbs and wanted a chair that would support my weight. This chair I have had for 2 months, glides across the carpeted floor and is comfortable to sit in all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good and is comfy
reviews.reviewText: I was able to put this together, quickly. Directions made sense. It’s comfy. I like the adjustability for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with Purchase
reviews.reviewText: Packing was excellent. Easy to assemble. Purchased this chair because of high reviews and the light blue color is hard to find. I gave this chair to my daughter for Christmas who is in college. She has stated that she finds it comfortable and loves that is roomy enough to sit crisscross-applesauce lol. The arms are adjustable in height and they were able to go low enough to push the chair under her low desk. After three weeks of use it has held up as new. The wheels are a bit tight so it doesn’t roll as easily as I would like on the hardwood floor, but it doesn’t bother my daughter. Overall happy with the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best office chair for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a comfortable chair with a lower profile to use in my tiny art studio, and this chair fit the bill perfectly. I put it together myself, and it came together easily with helpful, easy to understand instructions. I really like how comfortable it is as well as the tilt and variable height features. I’m very happy with this purchase.

Very nice chair that is esthetically pleasing, we purchased 8 of these for my office and they look great! Professional, comfortable and light-weight. Great price!! I will be purchasing more when the time comes.

I am sharing after using it for almost 2 months. Its really good quality.Shipping was fast! All of the parts were nicely packed and organized with proper coding to help you assemble. They were also labeled to match the installation manual, which makes it really easy to follow and install!The whole chair is sturdy and solid giving a proper comfort to work from home. The seat cushion is firm, ample, and comfy. The backrest can be tilted and still provides great support no matter how I sit. You can also adjust the height, so I was able to use this chair at two different desks. The armrests are pretty nice too. It’s a pretty good chair and I really like it!
Very comfortable chair, especially at the low price. Rolls very smoothly on carpet.

I liked the ease of install as well as the comfort level for my needs. It fits perfectly for my little office space. Sturdy and comfortable for my back as it upholds my posture upright and has a nice groove for the lower back. Thank you!

This is a very nice office task chair. It is a little more money than a cheap chair but so much better. It was very easy to assemble and appears to be very good quality. All in all, I would consider it excellent value.
